  1. Description

Annotation Interface TemplateMethod

@Documented @DesignPattern(EXTENSIBILITY) @Retention(SOURCE) @Target({TYPE,METHOD}) public @interface TemplateMethod
Marks a class or method as participating in the Template Method design pattern.

The Template Method is a behavioral design pattern that defines the skeleton of an algorithm in a base class (the template) while allowing subclasses to redefine specific steps without changing the overall algorithm structure.
